name: CryptoMarketUpdate
0:
”Alexa, open chart observer”
”Alexa, ask chart observer to give me a market update”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chart observer
Developer Terms of Use
des: The information provided includes a summary of 10 cryptocurrency tokens over the past 24 hours, telling you how many are up and how many are down. This is followed by a run down of each coin, its percentage change and the trading price. You will be reminded that the information is potentially delayed. Please do your own research before making any investment decisions. Nothing provided here is investment advice. Reasonable efforts are made to ensure the data is as accurate within 15 minutes, but we make no guarantees.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
